title: Augmented Reality-Based Social Inquiry Game Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and understanding of fundamental social concepts
context.additional_context: An augmented reality game development project for working professionals to enhance social domain competencies, designed and implemented as an educational AR game executable in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design narrative-based game scenarios simulating social situations using augmented reality technology
Learners can develop field-trip-linked educational content by applying location-based AR technology
Learners can establish educational effectiveness measurement metrics and write outcome reports according to project-based assessment criteria

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
